Text:
EXCELLENT! American Splendor is one of the best comics written. Straight from the streets of Cleveland! Alas Harvey Pekar has moved on - but it had such a great ear for idiom, and the stories of ordinary people (himself included).

Thanks for the ups!
You're most welcome, frobknob. And I totally agree. I was actually very surprised to find so little Pekar available at TPB.
